snp3.1:5.1: This is the only passage in the suttas where Bimbisāra appears in person. He does, however, feature quite frequently in the Vinaya.
snp3.1:6.2: _Suci_ here refers to his appearance, as agreed by the commentary, so “pure” is not very useful.
snp3.1:19.1: Buddhist tradition holds that the Buddha’s solar ancestry was shared with Bimbisāra.
